v - t - e The **leader of the House** is a position responsible for arranging [government](/wiki/Government_of_Singapore) business in the [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore). The leader of the House initiate [motions](/wiki/Motion_(parliamentary_procedure)) concerning the business of the House during parliamentary sittings, such as actions to be taken on procedural matters and extending sitting times. The incumbent leader of the House is [Pasir Ris–Changi GRC](/wiki/Pasir_Ris%E2%80%93Changi_GRC) MP, [Indranee Rajah](/wiki/Indranee_Rajah). ## List of Leaders of the House No.PortraitName Constituency (Birth–Death)Took officeLeft officeParty[Parliament](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)**1****[Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye)** MP for [Rochore](/wiki/Rochore_Constituency) (1921–2012)5 June 195915 April 1968[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[2nd Legislative Assembly](/wiki/2nd_Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)[3rd Legislative Assembly](/wiki/3rd_Legislative_Assembly_of_Singapore)[1st](/wiki/1st_Parliament_of_Singapore)**2****[E. W. Dhanabalan](/wiki/S._Dhanabalan)** MP for [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang_Single_Member_Constituency) (born 1937)2 January 198524 February 1987[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[6th](/wiki/6th_Parliament_of_Singapore)**4****[Wong Kan Seng](/wiki/Wong_Kan_Seng)** MP for [Kuo Chuan](/wiki/Kuo_Chuan_Constituency) (until 1988), [Toa Payoh GRC](/wiki/Toa_Payoh_Group_Representation_Constituency) (1988–1991), [Thomson GRC](/wiki/Thomson_Group_Representation_Constituency) (1991–1997) and [Bishan–Toa Payoh GRC](/wiki/Bishan%E2%80%93Toa_Payoh_Group_Representation_Constituency) (from 1997) (born 1946)25 February 198731 March 2007[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[7th](/wiki/7th_Parliament_of_Singapore)[8th](/wiki/8th_Parliament_of_Singapore)[9th](/wiki/9th_Parliament_of_Singapore)[10th](/wiki/10th_Parliament_of_Singapore)[11th](/wiki/11th_Parliament_of_Singapore)**5**[**Mah Bow Tan**](/wiki/Mah_Bow_Tan) MP for [Tampines GRC](/wiki/Tampines_Group_Representation_Constituency) (born 1948)1 April 200730 May 2011[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)**6**[**Ng Eng Hen**](/wiki/Ng_Eng_Hen) MP for [Bishan–Toa Payoh GRC](/wiki/Bishan%E2%80%93Toa_Payoh_Group_Representation_Constituency) (born 1958)31 May 201130 September 2015[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[12th](/wiki/12th_Parliament_of_Singapore)**7****[Grace Fu](/wiki/Grace_Fu)** MP for [Yuhua SMC](/wiki/Yuhua_Single_Member_Constituency) (born 1964)1 October 201523 August 2020[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[13th](/wiki/13th_Parliament_of_Singapore)**8**[**Indranee Rajah**](/wiki/Indranee_Rajah) MP for [Tanjong Pagar GRC](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_Group_Representation_Constituency) (until 2025) and [Pasir Ris–Changi GRC](/wiki/Pasir_Ris%E2%80%93Changi_Group_Representation_Constituency) (from 2025) (born 1963)24 August 2020Incumbent[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)[14th](/wiki/14th_Parliament_of_Singapore)[15th](/wiki/15th_Parliament_of_Singapore) ## title: Leader of the House (Singapore)
